wrongSentence: Naglalakad si Liza sa parke kahapon.
explanation: The action already happened in the past (kahapon). 'Naglakad' is the completed aspect.

wrongSentence: Nagbabasa si Carlo ng komiks kaninang umaga.
explanation: Reading occurred earlier this morning (kaninang umaga). 'Nagbasa' is the correct past form.

wrongSentence: Naglilinis si Ana ng silid-aralan bago ang klase.
explanation: The cleaning happened before class (past). 'Naglinis' indicates a completed action.

wrongSentence: Naglalaro ang mga bata ng habulan kanina.
explanation: The action happened a while ago (kanina). 'Naglaro' is the past tense form.

wrongSentence: Kakain si Miguel ng tanghalian sa kantina kanina.
explanation: The eating already occurred. 'Kumain' is the completed aspect of the -um- verb.

wrongSentence: Umiinom si Ana ng tubig kanina.
explanation: The time marker 'kanina' requires the past tense form 'Uminom'.

wrongSentence: Mag-aaral si Pedro ng matematika kagabi.
explanation: The action took place last night (kagabi). 'Nag-aral' is the past tense.

wrongSentence: Nagluluto si Maria ng hapunan noong gabi.
explanation: The marker 'noong' indicates a past time. 'Nagluto' is the completed form.

wrongSentence: Maglilinis si Juan ng sasakyan kanina.
explanation: The action is finished. 'Naglinis' is the past aspect of the verb.

wrongSentence: Magbabasa si Ella ng libro kagabi.
explanation: 'Kagabi' (last night) requires the completed aspect 'Nagbasa'.

wrongSentence: Lumalakad si Pedro sa paaralan kanina.
explanation: The walking happened in the past. 'Lumakad' is the perpektibo aspect.

wrongSentence: Maglalaro ang mga bata ng bola kahapon.
explanation: The marker 'kahapon' indicates the action is finished. Use 'Naglaro'.

wrongSentence: Kakain si Ana ng prutas kaninang umaga.
explanation: Eating happened earlier today. 'Kumain' is the completed aspect.

wrongSentence: Naglilinis si Carla ng banyo kanina.
explanation: 'Kanina' points to the past. 'Naglinis' is the correct perpektibo form.

wrongSentence: Maglalakad si Marco sa merkado kagabi.
explanation: The action was completed last night. Use 'Naglakad'.

wrongSentence: Kumakain si Rosa ng almusal ngayong umaga.
explanation: If the morning breakfast is already finished, 'Kumain' is the proper past form.

wrongSentence: Umiinom si John ng gatas kahapon.
explanation: The action happened yesterday. 'Uminom' is the past aspect.

wrongSentence: Mag-aaral si Tina ng agham kaninang umaga.
explanation: Studying was completed earlier. 'Nag-aral' is the past tense.

wrongSentence: Magluluto si Maria ng merienda kagabi.
explanation: Cooking happened in the past. 'Nagluto' is the correct aspect.

wrongSentence: Naglalaro si Paolo ng basketball kanina.
explanation: The action is finished. 'Naglaro' is the past form.

wrongSentence: Lumalangoy si Anna sa pool kahapon.
explanation: The action was completed yesterday. Use 'Lumangoy'.

wrongSentence: Nagbabasa si Carl ng dyaryo kanina.
explanation: Reading occurred in the past. 'Nagbasa' is the perpektibo aspect.

wrongSentence: Nag-eehersisyo si Lea sa gym kagabi.
explanation: Exercising happened last night. Use 'Nag-ehersisyo'.

wrongSentence: Naglinis si Lito ng kanyang kwarto bukas.
explanation: The word 'bukas' (tomorrow) requires the future aspect 'Maglilinis'.

wrongSentence: Naglaro si Ana ng tennis ngayon.
explanation: 'Ngayon' (now) indicates an ongoing action. 'Naglalaro' is the present aspect.

wrongSentence: Kumain si Miguel ng hapunan mamaya.
explanation: 'Mamaya' (later) requires the future aspect 'Kakain'.

wrongSentence: Nag-ehersisyo si Carlo sa gym ngayon.
explanation: The action is happening currently. 'Nag-eehersisyo' is the present form.

wrongSentence: Nagbasa si Lea ng libro bukas.
explanation: Reading will happen tomorrow. Use the future aspect 'Magbabasa'.

wrongSentence: Lumangoy si Paolo sa pool ngayon.
explanation: The action is currently happening. 'Lumalangoy' is the present aspect.

wrongSentence: Nagluto si Maria ng almusal bukas.
explanation: Cooking is set for tomorrow. 'Magluluto' is the future aspect.

wrongSentence: Nagbasa si Carlo ng dyaryo ngayon.
explanation: The action is happening now. Use the present aspect 'Nagbabasa'.

wrongSentence: Nag-aral si Tina ng agham bukas.
explanation: 'Bukas' indicates the future. 'Mag-aaral' is the contemplated aspect.

wrongSentence: Naglaro ang mga bata ng habulan ngayon.
explanation: The children are playing currently. 'Naglalaro' is the present aspect.

wrongSentence: Kumain si Ana ng prutas ngayon.
explanation: 'Ngayon' requires the present aspect of the verb. Use 'Kumakain'.

wrongSentence: Uminom si Miguel ng gatas ngayon.
explanation: The action is ongoing. 'Umiinom' is the present/imperpektibo form.

wrongSentence: Naglaro si Paolo ng basketball bukas.
explanation: The game will happen tomorrow. Use the future form 'Maglalaro'.

wrongSentence: Nag-eehersisyo si John sa gym bukas.
explanation: Exercising is scheduled for tomorrow. Use 'Mag-eehersisyo'.

wrongSentence: Naglilinis si Carla ng kotse bukas.
explanation: 'Bukas' requires the future/kontemplatibo aspect. Use 'Maglilinis'.

wrongSentence: Nag-ehersisyo si Lea sa gym ngayon.
explanation: Action is happening now. Use the ongoing present form 'Nag-eehersisyo'.

wrongSentence: Nagluto si Maria ng tanghalian bukas.
explanation: Cooking will happen tomorrow. Use the future form 'Magluluto'.

wrongSentence: Lumalangoy si Paolo sa dagat bukas.
explanation: 'Bukas' indicates a future action. 'Lalangoy' is the correct form.

wrongSentence: Nagbasa si Carlo ng libro ngayon.
explanation: Ongoing action requires the present aspect 'Nagbabasa'.

wrongSentence: Nag-aral si Tina ng musika bukas.
explanation: Action will occur in the future. 'Mag-aaral' is the correct aspect.

wrongSentence: Nagbabasa si Lito ng dyaryo bukas.
explanation: 'Bukas' requires the contemplated (future) aspect 'Magbabasa'.

wrongSentence: Nag-ehersisyo si Ana sa gym ngayon.
explanation: 'Ngayon' indicates an ongoing action. Use 'Nag-eehersisyo'.

wrongSentence: Nagluto si Maria ng tanghalian kanina.
explanation: The cooking is already finished. 'Nagluto' is the correct past form.

wrongSentence: Naglalakad si Ella sa parke kanina.
explanation: The action is completed. 'Naglakad' is the perpektibo/past aspect.

wrongSentence: Nagbabasa si Leo ng libro bukas.
explanation: The reading is for tomorrow. 'Magbabasa' is the future aspect.

wrongSentence: Naglilinis si Carla ng kusina kanina.
explanation: The cleaning is finished. Use the past tense form 'Naglinis'.

wrongSentence: Naglaro ang mga bata sa bakuran ngayon.
explanation: Playing is happening right now. Use the present form 'Naglalaro'.
